watchlist.warnText: Make sure you fill all the fields in the form
watchlist.infoText1: Operation was successful but an error occurred while saving history
watchlist.infoText2: Your transaction was rejected, try again after you are sure of your information, if the problem persists, contact customer service
watchlist.infoText3: Transaction Successful, you can see your Transaction Record on History page
